utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, what’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I found a note on my door, "Come to Monica’s quick, bring champagne and a Three Musketeers bar."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah I’ll take that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica and I are engaged.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God. Congratulations.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m engaged!!!!!! I’m engaged!!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, she’s been out there for twenty minutes, I’m surprised you didn’t hear her on the way over.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I thought it was just a kid yelling, "I’m gay! I’m gay!" Can I bring her in?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, let her stay out there. It’s sweet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m getting married!!!! I’m gonna be a bride!!!! No, I will not shut up because I’m engaged! Ohh, big talk! Huh, why don’t you come over here and say that to me?! Huh, buddy?! Yeah, my fiancee will kick your ass! Come on, apartment 20! Apartment 20!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, you get her in here. You bolt the door. I’ll be in the closet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! Wait-wait-wait! Shhh! Okay, umm, I just wanna say that…I love you guys so-so much and-and thank you for being here on my special night. Our special night. I mean it just wouldn’t be my—our-our night, if you all weren’t here to celebrate with me—us—Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s okay, I want this to be your night too. To Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Awww, come on—wait—stop it. Okay, to Monica.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: To Monica!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So have you decided on a band for the wedding? Because, y’know, I’m kinda musical.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah Pheebs, honey, she just got engaged a couple of hours ago. I doubt she’s even had time to…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well speaking of chiming in, remember the time you burned down my apartment?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, you’re on your own.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what we should do? We should all get dressed up and go to have champagne at The Plaza.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But I-I-I can’t stay too long, I gotta get up early for a commercial audition tomorrow and I gotta look good. I’m supposed to be playing a 19-year-old. What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So when you said, "Get up early," did you mean 1986?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You guys don’t think I look 19?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, 19! We thought you said 90!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay everybody, let’s go! Let’s go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, is uh the rest of my candy bar around here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh honey no, you ate it all.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I was afraid of that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what shoes would look great with this ring? Diamond shoes! You’re not getting dressed.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Know what I mean?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but I don’t think we have time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There’s gonna be a wedding. You’re gonna be the bride. Two hundred people are going to be looking at you in a clean white dress.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let’s do it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler! It happens to lots of guys! You-you-you were probably tired, you had a lot of champagne, don’t worry about it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m not worried, I’m uh, I’m fascinated. Y’know it’s like uh, Biology! Which is funny because in high school I uh, I-I failed Biology and tonight Biology failed me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Check it out. Okay, I can play this when the guests are coming in. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: If you would’ve let me finish, it goes on to say that he’s probably not gay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure, you guys don’t have this problem, you’re made of wood. Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You look great!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, thanks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You okay over there?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know, y’know? I feel a little umm… No, y’know what? Nevermind, I’m gonna be fine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, don’t worry about it I mean you probably were tired, you had a lot of champagne, it happens to everybody.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! Happy Monica’s night!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well thank you, you too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, do you believe this? Do you believe they are actually getting married?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well sure. But I get married all the time so…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess. I-I… I mean, do-do you think we’re ever gonna have that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You mean, we—you and me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no-no-no, no, no! We, you with someone and me with someone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh good, you scared me for a minute.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Shake it off.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I mean—no, it’s just ‘cause, it’s just ’cause you and I were like a nightmare. No, but there was some good times.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, absolutely. Y’know like it was umm…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Surely you can think of something good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, just give me a minute! Oh well, yes, I can think of one good thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well you uh, you were always really good at the uh, at the uh the stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? I was good at the stuff huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-hmm, uh-hmm, yeah, yeah, I really liked your hands.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My hands?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Way to go guys. Y’know, you-you were really good at the stuff too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I know. Hey, y’know what we never did? Oh no, not that. We uh, we never had bonus night!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y’know, bonus night. Y’know, when two people break up but they get back together for just one night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: One night, just-just sex. No strings attached?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah, we never had that,

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, this is getting a little crazy. I mean, I’m-I’m sure it would be amazing but I…gotta say I really-really don’t think it would be a good idea. Y’know? I really, really…don’t.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: ‘Sup? ‘Sup dude?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Take whatever you want, just please don’t hurt me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So you’re playing a little Playstation, huh? That’s whack! Playstation is whack! ‘Sup with the whack Playstation, ‘sup?! Huh? Come on, am I 19 or what?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, on a scale from 1 to 10, 10 being the dumbest a person can look, you are definitely 19.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on man, really how old?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Young! You’re a man-child okay?! Now go get changed because everybody’s ready and please, oh please, keep my underwear!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow thanks!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhh, you’ve had a lot of sex right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: When? Today? Some, not a lot.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it’s just the reason that I’m asking is because I kind of eh, uh, I was unable to—I mean I really wanted too, but I couldn’t…. There huh—hmm, there-there was an incident.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don’t worry about that man, that happens.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s happened to you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Once.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, what’d you do?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I did it anyway.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe! Come on! Let’s go! Come on! Why aren’t you dressed yet?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m sorry, but I just wrote the best dance song for your wedding. Check this out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, Phoebe, I’ll tell you what, if you get ready now I’ll let you play it at the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?! Oh that’s so exciting! Thank you! Thanks Mon! Oh but Mon, if you touch my guitar again I’ll have to pound on you for a little bit.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fair enough, now go get ready!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’ll get everybody else , finally we can start celebrating my— I’m sorry, uh apparently I’ve opened the door to the past.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, Monica. Mon, uh what-what you just saw…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Can I ask you just a little question, huh? Why tonight?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: See, I’ve been waiting my whole life to be engaged, and unlike some people I’m only planning on doing this once. So, uh y’know, maybe this is selfish and I’m sorry about it, but I was kinda hoping tonight could just be about that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh honey, but it is just about…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It is! It is!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No it’s not! No! No! Now it’s about you and Ross getting back together!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: See yeah umm, you kinda stole my thunder!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! Ho-ho! We did not steal your thunder because we are not getting back together!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. No. And you know what? Nobody even saw!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s true.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey I swear it we just kissed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was just a kiss.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys kissed!!!!! What does this mean?!! Are you, are you getting back together?! Can I sing at your wedding?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thunder being stolen!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay come on Phoebe, it’s nothing! Monica, come on!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look let’s not make a big deal out of this! It was a one time thing. It doesn’t even matter!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God! I cannot believe you guys are talking about this! The problems in the bedroom are between the man and the woman!!! All right?!! Now Chandler is doing the best he can!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t think that’s what they were talking about Joe!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What a great night, Chandler can’t do it, these guys kissed…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You guys kissed! Oh my—this is huge!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No-no, it’s really not huge.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And; people thinking it’s huge has led Monica to believe that we are stealing her thunder. Which we are not!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, we’re still talking about it, aren’t we?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well yeah, that and Chandler’s problem.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monica-Monica-Monica-Monica, listen-listen, listen, listen, would-would it make you feel better if we all stop talking about Ross and Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes that would be lovely.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You got it. Okay. Now, I can pass for 19 right?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, you can pass for 19.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Seriously? Seriously, no! You can play your own age which is 31!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, you are not! You’re 31.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aww crap!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, so The Plaza! Okay, we’ll get us some Mai Thai’s, maybe no more for you though.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what? I-I think that umm, I don’t feel like going to The Plaza.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, Monica, this is ridiculous! Look…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No-no, I-I really don’t want to talk about it! I don’t! Especially with you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Psss, that is whack!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah? Okay, I think I’ll play it at the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Well, I think we’ll see if they actually let you play. Huh? I mean they tell you anything you want to hear like-like, "You look 19," and then they just take it away like-like, "No you don’t."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I don’t think Monica is gonna take this away.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wouldn’t she?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Would she?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Would she? You ate my candy bar!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Guess who?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I just realized we kinda let some stuff up in the air…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What do you think Monica mean when she said she didn’t want to talk, especially with me? I mean, why not especially you and me? We were both out there kissing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Still thinking about it huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on! Serious-ser-ser-seriously, what did she mean by that? Especially you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, who cares?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I care!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And so do I.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y’know what, I-I have to go talk to her, would you let me just get changed?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Am I going to let you watch me undress?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t believe her, y’know it’s just—it’s so typical.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now Monica, I know you’re upset, but don’t forget. There is going to be a wedding, you are going to throw the bouquet, and then there’s going to be a honeymoon, maybe in Paris.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Paris?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We will take a moonlit walk on the Rue de la .

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Keep talking.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Then we will sprinkle rose pedals on the bed and make love. Not just because it’s romantic, but because I can!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I love you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bonjour, monsieur.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, don’t say anything, you might scare it away.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s Paris, who knows we’re here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi Pheebs, what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, you said I could sing at your wedding so, I’m just gonna need a small deposit.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know, just some good faith money to hold the date.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pheebs, we’re not giving you a deposit for our wedding!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I see.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They break your heart, don’t they?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know, I don’t really their permission.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! If you wanna sing at their wedding, well you sing at their wedding!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! And if you wanna look 19, then you… You gotta do something about your eyes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! What’s wrong with my eyes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: They give you away! There’s just-there’s just too much wisdom in there. Just put some tea bags on there for like 15 minutes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And that’ll get rid of my wisdom?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe just 10 minutes for you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, give her the deposit! Give her the ring! I don’t care!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, what did you mean before when you said you didn’t want to talk to anyone, especially me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What a great apology! And you accept! Okay, bye-bye!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No-no, seriously-seriously, what was the especially me part about?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, let’s just say it’s not the first time you’ve stolen my thunder.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, here’s a thought.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, what are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: My Sweet Sixteen! Remember, you went to third base with my cousin Charlie.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahh, third base.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s all everybody at the party could talk about!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, y’know what? The only reason I did that was because your party was so boring!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We had a characturist!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, your Sweet Sixteen was like a million years ago.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And yet, here we are doing it again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, Monica I don’t want to steal your stupid thunder!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh please! Why else would you have made out with Ross?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Got me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, easy mimey, the moment has passed, it ain’t gonna happen!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I just thought it would be nice if I could have just this one night!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I swear, I never wanted any part of your night!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, is that why you did it the secret hallway where nobody ever goes?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, Rachel, I’ve been thinking. I don’t think us getting together tonight is such a good idea. I’m calling it off.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why to save your dignity my man.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, why? Why would I ever want to take away from your night?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t know! I don’t—maybe you’re feeling a little resentful. Maybe ah, maybe you thought you’d get married first! Maybe you can’t stand the fact that your formally fat friend is getting married before you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh wow. That—y’know what? That is so unfair. Y’know what? Now I want to steal your thunder! Come on Ross, let’s go have sex!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t believe you’re gonna have sex on my engagement night!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, somebody should.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look uh, if we’re gonna do this…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We’re not gonna do this, all right? She’s just gonna think that we’re doin’ it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I see, so everybody wins.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s Monica, open up!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay well Ross! Stop it please! Wait a minute!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oww!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, you like that baby? May we help you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I just wanted to say that I hope you do have sex tonight and I hope that you guys get back together, but I must warn you, the night that you announce your engagement I’m going to announce that I’m pregnant!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How is that ever going to happen?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right Monica, do you want to know why I was with Ross tonight?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know why!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No you don’t know why!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! Why?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because! Because I was sad.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look, I am so…so happy for you guys, but you getting married just reminds me of the fact that I’m not. I’m not even close. And I don’t know, maybe I just wanted to make myself feel better. And I know that that’s dumb, but oh my God you were so depressed when Ross got married that you slept with Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t care, she slept with me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Anyway sweetie, I am, I’m so sorry I ruined your night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m sorry I almost made you sleep with Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I’m going to take off. Congratulations man.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And uh, Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What can I say, you missed your chance. From now on the only person who’s going to enjoy these bad boys is me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Here’s a dollar, consider it a deposit. Please sing at our wedding.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh thank you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now… "Who will perform the ceremony! Who will perform the cer——Oh—oh! All right, I’ll pound on him in the morning.
